questions.question: If I see something suspicious, I should report the incident promptly to
I have a duty to try to preserve any forensic evidence from an incident

answers.r: Yes. Do your best to save emails, notes, and photos.
Sorry. We need to try to keep this information.

questions.question: When a Cyber Security Incident happens, my responsibility is to ...

answers.r: Get a hold of yourself, Cadet

answers.a: Help however I can as directed by the Incident Response Team
Run to the nearest PSP and wait in front of the door for instructions
answers.r: Nice idea, but you may just get in the way
